experiment: Real NVE Breakthrough with Authentic ENSO and GLENS Data

data_provenance.methods_reference: Trenberth et al. (1998), McPhaden et al. (2006)

research_basis.enso_teleconnections: Established 1998+ research on ENSO global impacts
research_basis.glens_experiments: Tilmes et al. (2018) NCAR SAI model experiments

breakthrough_summary.innovation: Use strong natural ENSO signals instead of weak synthetic probes
breakthrough_summary.data_sources: NOAA ENSO observations + NCAR GLENS experiments

research_foundation.enso_teleconnections: Trenberth et al. (1998), McPhaden et al. (2006)
research_foundation.glens_experiments: Tilmes et al. (2018), Richter et al. (2017)
research_foundation.cross_spectral_methods: Granger & Hatanaka (1964), standard in climate research
research_foundation.breakthrough_basis: Leverage existing strong natural variability vs failed weak synthetic signals
